buildTitle: Major rework of the preference system
changes: Logging states for welcome, logging and suggestion can now be enabled or disabled
Command logging is now disabled by default
Removed preference getters and setters, replacing them with a single `set` command
Single preferences can now be retrieved via `get`
Logging, Welcome and Suggestion channels are all now set using the `setchannel` command
Invite commands moved to the Invite category
